pullRequest.title: Auth integration with Analytics
pullRequest.bodyText:
Integrates Auth into analytics following the pattern agreed on.
AWSMobileClient is still used directly for integration tests for now but will be replaced as a fast follow hence why I didn't create a special class to handle initializing it like was done in other categories.
By submitting this pull request, I confirm that my contribution is made under the terms of the Apache 2.0 license.

nodes.bodyText: Ah! Can you fix this and make it a reference?
